title: Won 'Hack the web' competition
name: Pruthvi Patel
description: Pruthvi Patel and Harshil Walia won the 'Hack the Web' DSC NUV website design competition organized by DSC Navrachana University and powered by Google and Microsoft Student Partner Program. Pruthvi & Hardik's bagged the first position out of 10 other teams, and got certificates from Microsoft and also got their website for DSC NUV be the official website for the club.

title: Won 'Hack the web' competition
name: Harshil Walia
description: Harshil Walia and Pruthvi Patel won the 'Hack the Web' DSC NUV website design competition organized by DSC Navrachana University and powered by Google and Microsoft Student Partner Program. Pruthvi & Hardik's bagged the first position out of 10 other teams, and got certificates from Microsoft and also got their website for DSC NUV be the official website for the club.

title: Conducted the GCP Crash Course
name: Perin Shah, Dhvanan Kotecha, & more
description: Successfully conducted a Google Cloud Platform Crash Course, with more than 80 students participating. Students that completed their study track, also got hoodies and schwags form Google.

title: Flutter IO Extended Contest Winners
name: Samarth & 2 More
description: Won the contest at the Flutter IO Extended event, and got schwags from Flutter.
